invention-title: Textured surface preparation method of battery and crystalline silicon laminated perovskite battery
一种电池的绒面制备方法及晶硅叠层钙钛矿电池

abstract.p: The invention discloses a suede preparation method of a battery and a crystalline silicon laminated perovskite battery, and belongs to the technical field of battery texturization, the surface of a monocrystalline silicon wafer is pre-cleaned and roughly polished by strong base, and the monocrystalline silicon wafer is cleaned by hydrogen peroxide; then placing the substrate in a texturing groove, and carrying out anisotropic corrosion by using a mixed solution of a NaOH solution and a texturing additive to form a pyramid structure; after texturing, cleaning with hydrogen peroxide again, and then placing in NaOH alkali liquor at the temperature of 25-30 DEG C for corrosion for 50-100 seconds; the method comprises the following steps: cleaning a monocrystalline silicon wafer with ozone, and reacting at room temperature for 50-150s; soaking the flower basket in a mixed solution of HF and HCl, slowly pulling the flower basket with hot water, and then drying the flower basket. The method has the beneficial effects that secondary alkali etching is adopted, and low-temperature alkali liquor is adopted during the secondary alkali etching, so that the tower footing of the pyramid is larger, the corrosion of the spire position is increased, and the smoother spire is obtained, so that the contact area is enlarged, and the deposition of the polycrystalline silicon thin film is facilitated.

本发明公开了一种电池的绒面制备方法及晶硅叠层钙钛矿电池，属于电池制绒技术领域，用强碱对单晶硅片表面进行预清洗粗抛，并用双氧水进行清洗；然后将其放置到制绒槽里，利用NaOH溶液和制绒添加剂的混合溶液进行各向异性腐蚀，形成金字塔结构；制绒后再次用双氧水清洗，然后放置在温度为25‑30℃的NaOH碱液中进行腐蚀，反应时间为50‑100s；利用臭氧清洗单晶硅片，在室温条件下进行反应，反应时间为50‑150s；用HF和HCl的混合溶液进行浸泡，并使用热水对花篮慢提拉，然后烘干。本发明的有益效果是：采用二次碱刻蚀，并在第二次碱刻蚀时采用低温碱液，使金字塔的塔基更大，增加塔尖位置腐蚀，得到较圆滑的塔尖，这样接触面积变大，更有利于多晶硅薄膜的沉积。
